backend/main.mo: Actor implementing player cash, speed, rewards, user profiles, and access‑controlled admin checks using Map-based state.
feature_evidence.json: Lists implemented features with associated frontend files, components, and test IDs for leaderboard and admin controls.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short descriptions of all major frontend components, hooks, and styling files.
frontend/index.css: Empty stylesheet placeholder for global styles.
frontend/index.html: Page shell that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root component that switches between SignInPage and GamePage based on authentication state.
frontend/src/components/AdminLeaderboard: Admin-only UI card with a button to enforce admin leaderboard leadership and success/error feedback.
frontend/src/components/GameLayout.tsx: Layout wrapper providing header, footer, and main content structure with login button and branding.
frontend/src/components/LeaderboardPanel: Displays top cash leaderboard with current user highlighting and admin detection, including loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Handles login/logout via Internet Identity and clears React Query cache on logout.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and refreshes backend actor instances tied to identity, initializing access control and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useCashActions.ts: Provides React Query mutations for initializing cash, adding cash, claiming rewards, and upgrading speed, invalidating related queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useCashLeaderboard.ts: Fetches and polls the cash leaderboard using React Query, gated on actor readiness.
frontend/src/hooks/useEnforceAdminLeader: Defines a mutation allowing admins to enforce leaderboard leadership and refreshes relevant queries, with custom error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useEnsurePlayerInitia: Manages player initialization flow, detecting uninitialized states and triggering setup while exposing status and retry controls.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity context and provider for authentication, handling login, identity persistence, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/usePlayerStatus.ts: Queries the player's status at a 1s interval once the actor is ready.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserRole.ts: Queries whether the current caller is an admin using the actor service.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/GamePage.tsx: Main game UI handling initialization states, earning cash, claiming rewards, upgrading speed, and displaying loading or error screens.
frontend/src/pages/SignInPage.tsx: Sign‑in landing page prompting users to authenticate and showing game feature highlights.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash-based), persist them in sessionStorage, and optionally remove them from the hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, container settings, animations, and plugins including typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s current game features, issues, and planned requirements for a Roblox-based cash and upgrade system.
